message: Starting clinical examples extraction from PDF text files. Reading source documents to identify case examples, symptom descriptions, and concrete behavioral examples.

Read both PDF files. Found rich clinical examples including: clanging dialogue, schizoaffective case, brief psychotic disorder case, delusional disorder examples (erotomanic, persecutory, somatic, jealous types), personality disorder examples, A Clockwork Orange aversion therapy. Now cataloging all examples systematically.

COMPLETED: Extracted and cataloged 22 clinical examples from PDF text files. Created clinical_examples_catalog.md with: (1) Schizophrenia spectrum - clanging dialogue, schizoaffective case, brief psychotic case, 4 delusional disorder subtypes with full case descriptions; (2) All 10 personality disorders with celebrity examples (Ted Bundy, Amy Winehouse, Van Gogh, etc.) and detailed case examples; (3) Treatment examples - A Clockwork Orange aversion therapy, CBT social anxiety scenario, Beck's negative triad. Each example includes full text from PDF, what it demonstrates, mechanisms, and usage guide for writing ADHD-friendly explanations.
